name: BIELSKI_SnotBubble
description:
Backstory

Mr. Jack Lumber a lumberjack by day and a defender of his health by night. One day both of his worlds collided. The snot bubbles found him at work and are hear to attack. His only hope if to fight back, Jack needs medicine!!!! Get 5 medicine packages to win!

 Control instruction

To jump start your character use space bar to propel forward. In order to change direction, use left and right arrow keys to change your rotation of Jack Lumber (The main Character) . Press up arrow to shoot axes to destroy the snot bubbles. Run in to the medicine to collect the medicine, to win collect five medicine packages. Be sure to avoid the snot bubbles, they will destroy your health points.
